subject: Tennis
Madison Square Garden
lead_paragraph: Venus Williams and women’s tennis are returning to Madison Square Garden for the first time in nearly nine years. Williams will join her top-ranked sister, Serena Williams, Ana Ivanovic and Jelena Jankovic on March 2 in the BNP Paribas Showdown for the Billie Jean King Cup. They will compete for $1.2 million in prize money in a one-set, no-ad scoring semifinal. The winners will play a best-of-three final. The Garden hosted the WTA season-ending championships in 2000.
